body:
Paul: probably vincent would know how popular / useful this optimizer is
for the general case.

On Wed, Feb 22, 2017 at 11:53 AM, Aaron Hu <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @poxvoculi <https://github.com/poxvoculi> A C++ implementation would be
> faster than python hacks like above. Also, maybe an awaiting googler label?
